TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintQueueStringProperty extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示打印队列的三个可能属性中的一个（且只有一个）属性：、 或 。

span.span: Represents one, and only one, of three possible properties of a print queue: , , or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的对象主要用作的重载方法之一的参数 。An object of this class is primarily used as a parameter for one of the overloaded methods of a . 使用此方法可以在只初始化其三个主要属性中的一个时安装打印队列 。This method makes it possible to install a print queue while initializing only one of its three major properties. 不可能有三个单独的方法重载，因为它们具有相同的签名，并且方法的两个重载都不能具有相同的签名。Having three separate overloads of the method is not possible because they would have the same signature and no two overloads of a method can have the same signature. 如果要安装打印队列并初始化它的两个或多个主要字符串属性，则有另一个重载， 它为参数替换了三个 参数 。If you want to install a print queue and initialize two or more of its major string properties, there is another overload, , that substitutes three parameters for the parameter. 这些参数用于按以下顺序设置主要字符串属性： 、 和 。These parameters are used to set the major String properties in this order: , , and . 使用空字符串作为与不想要初始化的属性相对应的参数。Use an empty string for a parameter that corresponds to a property you do not want to initialize. > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类 不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题，例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果要从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果 为 ，则 可能为 "部门供应室"; 但如果 为 ，则 可能为 "仅使用此打印机的 A4 大小纸张"。For example, if the is , the might be "Department Supply Room"; but if the is , the might be "Use only A4 size paper with this printer."

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值用于标识要表示的是打印队列的三个可能属性中的哪一个。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that identifies which of the three possible properties of a print queue is being represented.

value.span: 一个 ，用于指定要表示的打印队列属性的类型。

span.span: A that specifies the kind of print queue property that is being represented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 方法 使用此信息来确保将 值分配给要安装的的正确属性 。The method of a uses this information to ensure that the value is assigned to the correct property of the being installed.
